Blog - page 54

  1. 239-242

    09.09.2011

  2. 238: Luminarium Mirazozo

    05.09.2011

    I went into the Luminarium Mirazozo in George Square to shelter from the rain. It's a big walk-in sculpture lit with natural light from the outside. It's pretty peaceful in there, but it's also quite dark, which means ISO 800, which means some very noisy photos.

  3. 237: Up Arthur's Seat

    04.09.2011

  4. 236: Dicking around in the Camera Obscura

    02.09.2011

  5. 235: Edinburgh Castle

    31.08.2011

    I think I might be making a mistake posting some of these photos. I can't decide if I like them or not, but they're probably no good. Anyway, let me know what you think.

    The 1 o'clock gun. It made me jump so it's a bit blurry.

  6. 234: Drive. Stop. Photo. Drive. Stop. Photo.

    30.08.2011

    It's a good job I have no regard for road safety. Otherwise I wouldn't have been able to take some of these.

    In completely unrelated news, it took us ages to get to Edinburgh.
